com.justinkleiber.motor.base

Interface Vibrate

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FocusVibrate

    public interface Vibrate
    Sets up the Vibrate functions
    Author:
    Justin

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void vibrate(long ms)
      Vibrates the phone for a specified period of time
      void vibratePattern(long[] ms)
      Vibrates the phone as a pattern from an array of times Every even element is time on, odd elements are time off

    • Method Detail

      • vibrate

        void vibrate(long ms)
        Vibrates the phone for a specified period of time
        Parameters:
        ms - The amount of time to Vibrate in ms

      • vibratePattern

        void vibratePattern(long[] ms)
        Vibrates the phone as a pattern from an array of times Every even element is time on, odd elements are time off
        Parameters:
        ms - Array of time pattern in ms.
